issue.title: MATLAB API hx_connect() command from ethernet-connected computer returns error

content.raw: We have a copy of MATLAB 2014a running the API on a standalone conmputer right now, and the mex seems to be working. I am not getting the same error that I was reporting previously. We will be using a new 2014b license in the near future, as the old one was causing problems. The error I was encountering could have been due to using the old license over a VPN connection. I will let you know if the new license, which will be stored natively on our standalone computer, fixes the issue.
content.html: We have a copy of MATLAB 2014a running the API on a standalone conmputer right now, and the mex seems to be working. I am not getting the same error that I was reporting previously. We will be using a new 2014b license in the near future, as the old one was causing problems. The error I was encountering could have been due to using the old license over a VPN connection. I will let you know if the new license, which will be stored natively on our standalone computer, fixes the issue.
